title: Backstreet Boys Announces Residency at Las Vegas Sphere
description: Becoming the first pop band to headline the $2 billion Las Vegas venue. Backstreet Boys Announces Residency at Las Vegas Sphere Scoop Harrison
author: Scoop Harrison
excerpt: Backstreet Boys are set to become the first pop act to headline the Las Vegas Sphere when they stage their "Into The Millennium" residency in summer 2025.
text: Backstreet Boys are set to become the first pop act to headline the Las Vegas Sphere when they stage their “Into The Millennium” residency this summer. The boy band is currently slated to play 12 shows at the state-of-the-art $2 billion venue beginning on July 11th, 2025. According to a press release, fans “can expect an unforgettable experience as the Backstreet Boys bring their legendary Millennium album to life, alongside a selection of their greatest hits. Beloved classics like ‘I Want It That Way,’ and ‘Larger Than Life,’ will be delivered or enhanced with cutting-edge visuals and sound made possible by Sphere’s revolutionary immersive technology.” Get Backstreet Boys at Sphere Tickets Here Tickets for Backstreet Boys’ Sphere residency will first go on sale via an artist pre-sale beginning Tuesday, February 18th at 9:00 a.m. PT, with a Live Nation pre-sale follow on  Thursday, February 20th at 9:00 a.m. PT via Ticketmaster (use code DUET). A public on-sale will follow on Friday, February 21st at 9:00 a.m. PT. Once tickets are on sale, fans can look for deals or get tickets to sold-out shows via StubHub, where orders are 100% guaranteed through StubHub’s FanProtect program. StubHub is a secondary market ticketing platform, and prices may be higher or lower than face value, depending on demand. Additionally, on July 11th, Backstreet Boys will release Millennium 2.0, a 25th anniversary reissue of their blockbuster album featuring all 12 remastered originals, live recordings, demos, B-sides, and more. Backstreet Boys are the latest major act stage a residency at the Las Vegas Sphere, following U2, Phish, Dead & Company, Eagles, and Anyma. Beginning in May, Kenny Chesney will become the first country musician to headline the venue. Backstreet Boys at Las Vegas Sphere: Friday, July 11, 2025 Saturday, July 12, 2025 Sunday, July 13, 2025 Friday, July 18, 2025 Saturday, July 19, 2025 Sunday, July 20, 2025 Friday, July 25, 2025 Saturday, July 26, 2025 Sunday, July 27, 2025 Friday, August 1, 2025 Saturday, August 2, 2025 Sunday, August 3, 2025
html:
Backstreet Boys are set to become the first pop act to headline the Las Vegas Sphere when they stage their “Into The Millennium” residency this summer.

The boy band is currently slated to play 12 shows at the state-of-the-art $2 billion venue beginning on July 11th, 2025. According to a press release, fans “can expect an unforgettable experience as the Backstreet Boys bring their legendary Millennium album to life, alongside a selection of their greatest hits. Beloved classics like ‘I Want It That Way,’ and ‘Larger Than Life,’ will be delivered or enhanced with cutting-edge visuals and sound made possible by Sphere’s revolutionary immersive technology.”

Get Backstreet Boys at Sphere Tickets Here

Tickets for Backstreet Boys’ Sphere residency will first go on sale via an artist pre-sale beginning Tuesday, February 18th at 9:00 a.m. PT, with a Live Nation pre-sale follow on  Thursday, February 20th at 9:00 a.m. PT via Ticketmaster (use code DUET). A public on-sale will follow on Friday, February 21st at 9:00 a.m. PT.

Once tickets are on sale, fans can look for deals or get tickets to sold-out shows via StubHub, where orders are 100% guaranteed through StubHub’s FanProtect program. StubHub is a secondary market ticketing platform, and prices may be higher or lower than face value, depending on demand.

Additionally, on July 11th, Backstreet Boys will release Millennium 2.0, a 25th anniversary reissue of their blockbuster album featuring all 12 remastered originals, live recordings, demos, B-sides, and more.

Backstreet Boys are the latest major act stage a residency at the Las Vegas Sphere, following U2, Phish, Dead & Company, Eagles, and Anyma. Beginning in May, Kenny Chesney will become the first country musician to headline the venue.

Backstreet Boys at Las Vegas Sphere:
Friday, July 11, 2025
Saturday, July 12, 2025
Sunday, July 13, 2025
Friday, July 18, 2025
Saturday, July 19, 2025
Sunday, July 20, 2025
Friday, July 25, 2025
Saturday, July 26, 2025
Sunday, July 27, 2025
Friday, August 1, 2025
Saturday, August 2, 2025
Sunday, August 3, 2025
